alert.note: Alert for Jim Hogg; Starr; Zapata (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Freeze Watch issued January 01 at 9:39PM CST until January 03 at 8:00AM CST by NWS Brownsville
info.description: ...FREEZE WATCH REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM LATE SUNDAY NIGHT THROUGH MONDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Sub-freezing temperatures as low as 29 possible. * WHERE...Zapata, Starr, Inland Willacy and Northern Hidalgo Counties. * WHEN...From late Sunday night through Monday morning. * IMPACTS...Frost and freeze conditions could kill crops, other sensitive vegetation and possibly damage unprotected outdoor plumbing. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Freezing temperatures 32 degrees or below may occur for 2 to 5 hours.
info.instruction: Take steps now to protect tender plants from the cold. To prevent freezing and possible bursting of outdoor water pipes they should be wrapped, drained, or allowed to drip slowly. Those that have in-ground sprinkler systems should drain them and cover above- ground pipes to protect them from freezing.
